metadata.title: CVE-2017-18231 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26. A NULL pointerdereference vulnerability was found in the function ReadEnhMetaFile incoders/emf.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via acrafted file.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
